First MC^2 Meeting of 2017-18

28 Sep 2017

Welcome to the the 2017-18 school year! Today, David Salusbury from Carleton University visited our club and give a presentation on his new enrichment coures, Math connections in Science and Beyond. Carleton also have many other enrichment programs, and I definitely reccomend you check them out here
